resources.name: task_0
resources.query:
from(bucket: "rucket_1")
  |> range(start: -5d, stop: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_idle")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
